name: Violent Sol Worlds
detailed_description: Earth and the core worlds are suffering. Overpopulation and lack of resources are leading to unrest and desperation. That's where you come in. You've been recruited to colonize a planet more than 4 light years away. It's your job to save the human race from its own greed and consumption. The game is experienced from a top-down view allowing for the deliberate and creative customization of every item, vehicle, and structure in use. Using a dynamic artificial intelligence the AI Overlord will change up every aspect of the game. Nothing stays the same forever, making Violent Sol Worlds an addictively, dynamic experience with limitless replayability.
